Source   Edit  

Handy identifiers for a bit more clarityOur global CT variable that stores all information to auto serialize the Nim exported procedures to a corresponding R wrapper.

Types

ExportProc = object
  name*: string
  origFn*: NimNode           ## The original function NimNode
  isVoid*: bool
  params*: NimNode
  body*: NimNode
Source   Edit   
NimRModule = object
  file*: string
  procs*: seq[ExportProc]
Source   Edit

    forbids: [].}

                                 tags: [WriteIOEffect], forbids: [].}
